title: Maycee Barber: 'No Answers' Regarding Medical Issue That Forced Main Event Exit
summary: Maycee Barber remains uncertain about the medical issue that led to her withdrawal from the UFC Vegas 107 main event, as the exact cause is still unknown.

title: Former Sean O’Malley Foe Kris Moutinho to Make UFC Return in Atlanta
summary: Kris Moutinho, known for his bout against Sean O'Malley, is set to return to the UFC in an upcoming event in Atlanta.

title: PFL’s Alexandr Shabliy Suspended 6 Months for Anti-Doping Violation
summary: Alexandr Shabliy of the Professional Fighters League has been suspended for six months following an anti-doping violation.

title: Merab Dvalishvili Eyes Quick Turnaround, Title Defense vs. Sandhagen After UFC 316
summary: Merab Dvalishvili is planning a swift return to the octagon for a title defense against Cory Sandhagen following UFC 316.

title: Jon Jones Disses UFC Fighter With Initials 'C.C'
summary: Jon Jones expressed his disapproval of a UFC fighter with the initials 'C.C', stating he doesn't want to mention the fighter's name.

title: Sean O’Malley Says Lifestyle Changes Ahead of UFC 316 Are Not 'Performance Based'
summary: Sean O'Malley clarified that his recent lifestyle changes leading up to UFC 316 are not related to performance enhancement.

title: Valentina Shevchenko Supports Julianna Pena Against Kayla Harrison at UFC 316
summary: Valentina Shevchenko has expressed her support for Julianna Pena in her upcoming fight against Kayla Harrison at UFC 316.

title: Merab Dvalishvili: Sean O'Malley Clear No. 1 Contender at Bantamweight
summary: Merab Dvalishvili acknowledges Sean O'Malley as the clear number one contender in the bantamweight division.

title: Conor McGregor Surprises Laura Sanko With Special Gift
summary: Conor McGregor surprised UFC commentator Laura Sanko with a special gift, showcasing his thoughtful side.

title: Gable Steveson Praises Merab Dvalishvili Ahead of UFC 316
summary: Wrestling standout Gable Steveson praised Merab Dvalishvili's endurance and performance ahead of UFC 316.
